meanings.definition: The quality of being clever or deceitful.
meanings.sent1: Her cunningnesses in solving puzzles always amazed her friends.
meanings.sent2: The detective relied on his cunningnesses to catch the thief.
meanings.sent3: The fox's cunningnesses in outsmarting the farmer led to many stolen chickens.
meanings.sent4: His cunningnesses were like a spider weaving a web of lies.
meanings.sent5: The cunningnesses of the magician made the audience gasp in wonder.

meanings.definition: The act of being sly or crafty.
meanings.sent1: The cunningnesses of the cat helped it catch the mouse.
meanings.sent2: She used her cunningnesses to win the game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon's cunningnesses in stealing food from the campers amused the children.
meanings.sent4: His cunningnesses were like a hidden trap waiting to be sprung.
meanings.sent5: The cunningnesses of the spy were unmatched in the world of espionage.
